description: This table contains the history of this adverse event's related supplies. Together with ADV_EVT_SUPPLY_ATTR_HISTORY, these tables contain the history of an adverse event's supply attributions.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the adverse event history in the adverse event record. Together with ADVERSE_EVENT_ID, this forms the foreign key to the ADVERSE_EVENT_HISTORY table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple supply records that is related to the adverse event at the time the adverse event was documented.

columns.name: HX_ITEM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the supply record that is related to the adverse event at the time the adverse event was documented.

columns.name: HX_ITEM_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.
